data.title: Events and Concerts in Naples: June 2024 Highlights
data.meta_description: Music"My Wonderful 80s... and More!" by Nino D'Angelo at the Maradona StadiumTomorrow, Saturday, June 29, Nino D'Angelo will be performing in concert in his hometown of Naples at the Diego Armando...
data.text:
Music

"My Wonderful 80s... and More!" by Nino D'Angelo at the Maradona Stadium

Tomorrow, Saturday, June 29, Nino D'Angelo will be performing in concert in his hometown of Naples at the Diego Armando Maradona Stadium for an unmissable and unique event titled "My Wonderful 80s... and More!".

Tropico in Concert at Piazza Plebiscito

Great anticipation for the concert of Davide Petrella, known as Tropico, scheduled for today, Friday, June 28, at Piazza Plebiscito. On stage with the Neapolitan artist, there will be many great guests from the Italian music scene. Among these, the presence of Elisa, Ghali, Franco126, and Achille Lauro has already been announced.

"The Arena of Hearts" with Rosario Miraggio & Co at the Arena Flegrea

On Thursday, June 20, at Caffe Gambrinus, Rosario Miraggio presented the event "The Arena of Hearts". The artist announced that tomorrow, Saturday, June 29, at 9:00 PM, many will be at the Arena Flegrea for the event featuring many artists including Clementino, Aka 7Even, Hal Quartier, Iven Granatino, LDA, Mr. Hyde, Gianluca Capozzi, and Mavi.

"Music Under the Stars" at Villa Domi

Today, Friday, June 28, at 7:30 PM, a magical evening under the stars will be held at the historic 18th-century hilltop residence of Villa Domi, among lush gardens. At the event "Music Under the Stars", there will be live music performed by two exceptional voices, soprano Cav. Teresa Sparaco and pop tenor Gianni Di Meo, who will delight the audience with their powerful voices and the Royal Butterfly orchestra conducted by maestro Franco Damiano, all live. The villa is located at Salita Scudillo 19/A in Naples.

Theater

Pamela Virrolesi at the "Sorrento Incontra 2024" Festival

Actress Pamela Villoresi will be the star of the new event at the "Sorrento Incontra 2024" festival on Sunday, June 30, at 8:00 PM at the Cloister of San Francesco. For the event promoted by the Municipality of Sorrento and organized by "In Scena", the appreciated and well-known artist, on the occasion of the centenary of Eleonora Duse's death, will present, accompanied on the piano by maestro Marco Scolastra, the show "Music in the Soul - Portrait of Eleonora Duse Through the Notes of Her Era".

"Independent Dignity of Prostitution" at Castel Sant'Elmo

Fifty editions, over 470 performances, and more than 700,000 spectators in numerous Italian cities for "Independent Dignity of Prostitution", the show/happening by Luciano Melchionna, which returns to the stage from June 29 to July 14 at Castel Sant'Elmo in Naples. DADP returns for the third consecutive year to animate the ancient walls of the Castle, which "confirms - reads a note from the Campania Regional Museums Directorate - its role as a protagonist in the city's cultural programming".

Chills of Summer 2024 at the Real Orto Botanico of Naples (with Maurizio de Giovanni)

The inauguration of Chills of Summer 2024, the twenty-third edition of the historic festival dedicated to dreams, organized by Il Pozzo e il Pendolo Teatro of Naples, will be entrusted to the new 'creation' of Maurizio de Giovanni. From Saturday, June 29, at 9:00 PM, it will return to animate the fascinating setting of the Real Orto Botanico of Naples with its stories.

Opening the festival on Saturday, June 29, will be The Song of the Sea by and with Maurizio de Giovanni, accompanied by Rosaria De Cicco, Paolo Cresta, Marianita Carfora, Giacinto Piracci, Enzo Grimaldi. The Neapolitan writer retells Maruzza Musumeci by Andrea Camilleri, paying homage to the greatest Italian storyteller. The rewriting of an extraordinary story intertwining myth, history, and much more, through a poetic narrative as sweet and unpredictable as the sea water.

The first weekend of the festival will feature, on Sunday, June 30, the second novelty, Lighea by Giuseppe Tomasi di Lampedusa, with Paolo Cresta and Carlo Lomanto, one of the most extraordinary, visionary, and erotic stories of twentieth-century Italian literature. Another novelty is scheduled for Thursday, July 4, with Nico Ciliberti in Migliore by Mattia Torre, a story about our times, about people who build their success on unscrupulousness, cynicism, and contempt for others.

The Third Edition of CuciNights at the Ciro Colonna Center Arena

The third edition of CuciNights, a theatrical festival curated by the Collettivo lunAzione company, will start on Saturday, June 29, at 9:00 PM with an unmissable event: the concert "Transleit 2.0" by the Ebbanesis. The free event will be held outdoors at the arena of the Ciro Colonna Center in Ponticelli, Naples.

Monica. Ode to Freedom at the Secret Garden of the Royal Palace of Portici

On Sunday, June 30, at 6:30 PM, at the Secret Garden of the historic Royal Palace of Portici, the second event of the "Beyond the Garden" festival, a project by Mario Gelardi, will take place, organized in collaboration with the BLab association, organized by Idee fuori scena and the Nuovo Teatro Sanità association, in synergy with MUSA - Museums of the Royal Palace of Portici and the Department of Agriculture, and with the support of ConTRA Group, sponsor of the festival.

Events

Naples Pride 2024

The highly anticipated event will take place on Saturday, June 29, and has been preceded by the second edition of the Pride Park: a week of meetings, shows, and cultural events to discuss freedom and civil rights. Singer-songwriter Malika Ayane will be the godmother of Naples Pride 2024. The president of the Campania Region, Vincenzo De Luca, has also announced his presence at the Naples Pride on June 29.

"Inventions for Three Voices" at the Herculaneum Park

The Herculaneum Park is the first archaeological site to host the dawn show. "Inventions for Three Voices" is the event scheduled for June 29 with repeats on July 20 and August 31: it is an original production by CoopCulture, which will animate some of Italy's historical, artistic, and archaeological wonders until August.

Upside at the Mostra d'Oltremare

On June 28 and 29, Naples, a city rich in history and tradition, becomes the stage for an innovative technological challenge in the world of gaming: Upside, the first gaming competition oriented towards emerging technologies. The event will be held at the prestigious Mostra d'Oltremare.

Celebrations at Villa delle Ginestre for the Anniversary of Giacomo Leopardi's Birth

The anniversary of Giacomo Leopardi's birth is at the center of a series of initiatives scheduled until Saturday, June 29, at Villa delle Ginestre, which was the residence that hosted the poet in the last season of his life. On Friday, June 28, curated by Raffaella Lanzetta, musical guests and poetic readings will follow one another for the event "Ginestre for Leopardi".

On Saturday, June 29, the 226th birthday of Leopardi will be celebrated with the final event of the Passeggiate Leopardiane project, promoted by the Fondazione Ville Vesuviane and the Ministry of Culture.

"Affabulazione. Expressions of Polycentric Naples" at the Centro Direzionale

The impossible interview with two illustrious Neapolitans, Salvatore Di Giacomo and Benedetto Croce, becomes possible with the performance-show that will animate, on Friday, June 28, 2024, at 6:30 PM, the heart of the Centro Direzionale of Naples. The show will be hosted at Isola G2 of the Centro Direzionale of Naples and will be accompanied by a cocktail at Area Lab35, in Isola G5, accessible from via Giovanni Porzio 4.

The essayist and the philosopher, respectively played by Monica Nappo and Renato Bisogni, come to life in the event organized by the association "La Dramaturgie" as part of the third edition of "Affabulazione. Expressions of Polycentric Naples", a festival of the Municipality of Naples funded by the national fund for the show of the general directorate for the show of the Ministry of Culture.

"Alice lost inside you-This is wonderland" at the Mostra d'Oltremare

Fifteen hundred handcrafted installations, 25 original musical tracks, a show rich in choreography, lights, and sounds, two tailor-made performances. These are the numbers of "Alice lost inside you-This is wonderland", a journey made of colors and narrative art that, after captivating about half a million spectators, makes a stop in Naples until September 30 at the Mostra d'Oltremare.

Exhibitions

The "Night of Small Art Places" at the Rione Sanità
